iron shardaxe.comment: Remapping the iron shardaxe to a regular battle axe with +2 lightning infusion and the lightning slash skill.

iron longsword.comment: Remapping 'iron longsword' to the Elden Ring Longsword.

steel flameslayer.comment: Remapping the steel flameslayer to a flamberge with +3 fire infusion and the flaming slash skill.

steel flamesword.comment: Remapping the steel flamesword to a scimitar with +3 fire infusion and the flaming slash skill.

steel frostsword.comment: Remapping the steel frostsword to a scimitar with +3 cold infusion and the chilling mist skill.

steel halberd.comment: Remapping the steel halberd to a halberd +3

steel jinkblade.comment: Remapping the steel jinkblade to a poison dagger +3

steel jinkblade of the aegis.comment: Remapping the steel jinkblade of the aegis to a Misericorde +3
